snippet: A Navy criminal investigator, John B. Beliveau II, plans to plead guilty to accepting bribes from a Malaysian contractor, representing the first conviction in a major ship-supply scandal.
abstract: Navy criminal investigator John B Beliveau II plans to plead guilty on to accepting bribes from a Malaysian contractor, representing the first conviction in a major ship-supply scandal.
